title: Machine Quilting With Style: From Walking-foot Wonders to Free-motion Favorites
features: Quilt along with Christa using walking-foot

free-motion techniques to create fabulous quilts--from start to finish--on your home sewing machine. Award-winning quilter Christa Watson shows you how with 8 different walking-foot designs and 10 free-motion quilting motifs, plus 12 inventive patterns to put all the quilting techniques to use!
